sql-case.value: REVOKE CREATE ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW, ALTER ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW, DROP ANY MATERIALIZED VIEW FROM user1
REVOKE CREATE SESSION FROM user1, user2
REVOKE role1, role2 FROM user1, user2
REVOKE SELECT ON ds_0.t_order FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ds_0.t_order FROM user1
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON ds_0.t_order FROM user1
REVOKE SELECT ON ds_0.t_order FROM user1, user2
REVOKE SELECT (order_id) ON ds_0.t_order FROM user1
REVOKE INHERIT PRIVILEGES ON user1 FROM user2
REVOKE role1, role2 FROM FUNCTION ds_0.function1, FUNCTION ds_0.function2
